Directions: In a skillet, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink; drain. Stir in the cheese and soup mix; set aside. Separate crescent dough into triangles; cut each triangle in half lengthwise, forming two triangles. Place 1 tablespoon of the beef mixture along the wide end of  each triangle. Roll up; place pointed side down 2 in. apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 375&deg: for 15 minutes or until golden brown.
